about_the_game:
Gear up for Battle Pass: Rambo with the Guerrilla Kit DLC, free on Steam! Unleash your inner hero with special rewards, including the one-of-a-kind Guerrilla event decal, inspired by the unstoppable spirit of the legendary lone wolf, John Rambo. This DLC also includes essential consumables to keep you prepared for any challenge on the battlefield.

The Guerrilla Kit DLC features:
  • x3 "Guerrilla" projection decals
  • x3 Large Repair Kits
  • x3 Large First Aid Kits
  • x3 Automatic Fire Extinguishers
Fuel your courage and dominate the battlefield with supplies every true warrior needs. Make the most of the unique rewards offered in this special Battle Pass launch!

NOTE: This DLC is only available until January 30, 2025. Log in to claim your gifts!

DLC can be added to your World of Tanks account only once.

You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

RAMBO™ is a Trademark owned by STUDIOCANAL S.A.S.
© 2025 STUDIOCANAL S.A.S. ® All Rights Reserved.
